casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Anthony Earl HARP, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158145
COA: 342142 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 4, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 11, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant's motion for relief from judgment is prohibited by MCR 6.502(G).
